title: Colour Spray
content:
ms:

Ring of Colour Spray (found in Harpy Nest behind Druid Temple)

Colour Spray Tips & Notes

Blinded creatures are unable to make attacks of opportunity.

Differences from D&D 5th Edition:

Area is a 15ft cone rather than a 17ft cone. Affects a combined hit point total of 6d10; 33 is the average. The effect lasts until the end of the caster's next turn, rather than the effect expiring at the end of each target's next turn.
